category.category_description: qVietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only

menu.name: Mojito
menu.description: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juiceeee
menu.category_description: Vietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only

menu.name: Mauresque
menu.description: Add the ice cubes at the end, otherwise the syrup and pastis do not mix well.
menu.category_description: Vietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only

menu.name: Mango Mojito
menu.description: Squeeze the juice from 1½ limes and blend with the mango to give a smooth purée
menu.category_description: Vietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only

menu.name: Monkey Wrench
menu.description: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.
menu.category_description: Vietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only

menu.name: Mulled Wine
menu.description: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes.
menu.category_description: Vietnam is the world’s second largest producer of coffee. As a Vietnamese brand, Highlands Coffee hand selects and roasts only
